error.noscript: You need to enable Javascript to use this website properly.
error.webkit: You should use a webkit-based browser to enjoy all of the page's features.

unsafe: Your connection is not safe. Consider connecting to this website via SSL.

guid.annotation: A string which has the format {xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx} where x represents a hexadecimal character

login.invalid: The given GUID and/or password are invalid.
login.blocked: The user associated with the given GUID is blocked and must be unblocked by an administrator.
login.explanation: You are not logged in. Please use the form below to log into your account.
